title: I cant login i need help please
body:
ever since patch 6.16 updated i cant login and im getting this error everytime i try to do so,
the error says   "did not recieve a response from the server", retrying, attempt 1.2.3
help plz

replies.body: Are you still having this issue?  There were some issues with the login servers, but everything should be okay now!  I recommend bookmarking our[ service status](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na) page to keep updated on any issues.  Hope that helps!

No the problem is still going on and when i try to uninstall league and try to reinstall it it gives me an error saying Lol.NA.msi file not found and i need the to be verified before uninstalling, anyway u can help??

It sounds like you may have originally had a connection issue, but now it seems that it's been escalated due to file corruption.  It's important not to modify or delete files, as it can cause more trouble than solve.  I recommend running our  [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs) and selecting a clean reinstall to normalize your client.  If your issue persists afterwards, let me know including what errors exactly.  I'll be around!
